<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>release_project</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>SNC Release Delete Phases</name> <order>100</order> <priority/> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[gs.log("Release Delete Phase starting"); deletePhases(current); gs.log("Release Delete Phase ending");
function deletePhases(current) { var grPhase = new GlideRecord('release_phase'); grPhase.addQuery('release', '=', current.sys_id); grPhase.query(); while (grPhase.next()) { grPhase.deleteRecord(); } }
]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2006-05-07 08:32:41</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>0dfa169e0a0a0a0a01bab2a6fae138a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SNC Release Delete Phases</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Release Management" source="com.snc.release_management">0486f4243cb1311068bcf327dfe37f8f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0dfa169e0a0a0a0a01bab2a6fae138a9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>glide.maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2006-05-07 08:35:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0dfa169e0a0a0a0a01bab2a6fae138a9"/> </record_update>
